TopicTitle: Wheels have no collision between other vessels and cannot get traction off of them

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel Core I7-3770 | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | RAM: 16.0 GB

 

Hello!

I was recently testing a primitive rotor design (using wheels and a chamber to hold them and move the wheels) and found that the wheels have no collision and can't interact with any vessel. I tested this theory on just a simple platform and it still did not seem to work. I tested this with the M1 wheel, but couldn't with the others as the game was being fussy.
